languages.text: "Пока ты залечивал{mf||а} раны сего мира после атаки моих темных кузенов, мне удалось узнать... нет, не судьбу Крудараха. Лишь намеки на нее. Как Муаран нашел прибежище под сенью лесов Лилэтан, так и другие мои собратья нашли новое пристанище в системе, известной как Атласов Предел. Мы должны поспешить туда... пока новые опасности не уничтожили свидетелей, способных указать путь к потерянному Крудараху, чья судьба все еще скрыта между звезд!"

traits.locale_text: "Пока ты залечивал{mf||а} раны сего мира после атаки моих темных кузенов, мне удалось узнать... нет, не судьбу Крудараха. Лишь намеки на нее. Как Муаран нашел прибежище под сенью лесов Лилэтан, так и другие мои собратья нашли новое пристанище в системе, известной как Атласов Предел. Мы должны поспешить туда... пока новые опасности не уничтожили свидетелей, способных указать путь к потерянному Крудараху, чья судьба все еще скрыта между звезд!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "While you were mending the wounds of this world left by the twisted ones' attack, I was able to discover... no, not Crudarach's fate. Merely traces of it. As Muaran found sanctuary under the boughs of the Lilaethan's forests, so did my other kin find refuge in a system known as the Atlas Reach. We must make a journey there with haste... before new dangers destroy the witnesses who can show me a way to the lost Crudarach, whose fate remains shrouded by the stars!"
languages.original_text: "Пока ты залечивал{mf||а} раны сего мира после атаки моих темных кузенов, мне удалось узнать... нет, не судьбу Крудараха. Лишь намеки на нее. languages.text: « Pendant que vous pansiez les plaies de ce monde après cette perverse attaque, j'ai pu découvrir... non, pas ce qui est arrivé à Crudarach. Seulement quelques indices. Tout comme Muaran a trouvé le salut sous les frondaisons des forêts de la lilaethan, les autres membres de mon peuple se sont réfugiés dans un système baptisé Confins de l'Atlas. Nous devons nous y rendre sur le champ... avant que de nouveaux périls n'emportent les seuls témoins capables de me montrer le chemin vers Crudarach, dont le destin reste voilé par les étoiles ! »
languages.original_text: "While you were mending the wounds of this world left by the twisted ones' attack, I was able to discover... no, not Crudarach's fate. Merely traces of it. As Muaran found sanctuary under the boughs of the Lilaethan's forests, so did my other kin find refuge in a system known as the Atlas Reach. We must make a journey there with haste... before new dangers destroy the witnesses who can show me a way to the lost Crudarach, whose fate remains shrouded by the stars!"

traits.locale_text: « Pendant que vous pansiez les plaies de ce monde après cette perverse attaque, j'ai pu découvrir... non, pas ce qui est arrivé à Crudarach. Seulement quelques indices. Tout comme Muaran a trouvé le salut sous les frondaisons des forêts de la lilaethan, les autres membres de mon peuple se sont réfugiés dans un système baptisé Confins de l'Atlas. Nous devons nous y rendre sur le champ... avant que de nouveaux périls n'emportent les seuls témoins capables de me montrer le chemin vers Crudarach, dont le destin reste voilé par les étoiles ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “当你忙着修补那些扭曲之人袭击后遗留的创伤时，我发现了……不，并不是克鲁达拉赫的命运，仅仅是某些痕迹而已。正如穆兰在莉莱赞的森林之下找到了庇护，我的另一部分族人在某个被称为‘阿特拉斯边际’的星系中找到了避难所。他们可以告诉我克鲁达拉赫的命运，但他们自身的命运仍然笼罩在群星之中。我们必须赶紧前往那里……赶在新的劫难降临在他们头上之前！”
languages.original_text: "While you were mending the wounds of this world left by the twisted ones' attack, I was able to discover... no, not Crudarach's fate. Merely traces of it. As Muaran found sanctuary under the boughs of the Lilaethan's forests, so did my other kin find refuge in a system known as the Atlas Reach. We must make a journey there with haste... before new dangers destroy the witnesses who can show me a way to the lost Crudarach, whose fate remains shrouded by the stars!"

traits.locale_text: “当你忙着修补那些扭曲之人袭击后遗留的创伤时，我发现了……不，并不是克鲁达拉赫的命运，仅仅是某些痕迹而已。正如穆兰在莉莱赞的森林之下找到了庇护，我的另一部分族人在某个被称为‘阿特拉斯边际’的星系中找到了避难所。他们可以告诉我克鲁达拉赫的命运，但他们自身的命运仍然笼罩在群星之中。我们必须赶紧前往那里……赶在新的劫难降临在他们头上之前！”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「歪んだ者たちの攻撃により残されたこの世界の傷をあなたが修復している間に、私はクルダラの運命を知ることができた…いや、正確には運命ではなく、単なる痕跡だ。ムアランがリラエタンの森の木陰で逃げ場を見つけたように、私の血族もアトラス・リーチと呼ばれる星系で隠れ家を見つけたのだ。失われたクルダラへの道を示す証人たちが新たな危険によって滅ぼされる前に…我々は急いでそこへ旅立たなければならない。彼らの運命は星々に覆われたままなのだ！」
languages.original_text: "While you were mending the wounds of this world left by the twisted ones' attack, I was able to discover... no, not Crudarach's fate. Merely traces of it. As Muaran found sanctuary under the boughs of the Lilaethan's forests, so did my other kin find refuge in a system known as the Atlas Reach. We must make a journey there with haste... before new dangers destroy the witnesses who can show me a way to the lost Crudarach, whose fate remains shrouded by the stars!"

traits.locale_text: 「歪んだ者たちの攻撃により残されたこの世界の傷をあなたが修復している間に、私はクルダラの運命を知ることができた…いや、正確には運命ではなく、単なる痕跡だ。ムアランがリラエタンの森の木陰で逃げ場を見つけたように、私の血族もアトラス・リーチと呼ばれる星系で隠れ家を見つけたのだ。失われたクルダラへの道を示す証人たちが新たな危険によって滅ぼされる前に…我々は急いでそこへ旅立たなければならない。彼らの運命は星々に覆われたままなのだ！」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Während Ihr Euch der Wunden dieser Welt annahmt, die der Angriff der Verzerrten hinterließ, schaffte ich es, Crudarachs Schicksal aufzudecken. Leider nicht vollständig, sondern nur einzelne Spuren davon. So wie Muaran unter den Ästen der Wäldern Lileaths Zuflucht fand, fand auch mein Volk Zuflucht in einem System, das als Atlasweite bekannt ist. Wir müssen schnell dorthin reisen ... bevor neue Gefahren alle Zeugen vernichten. Nur sie können mir den Weg zum verlorenen Crudarach zeigen, dessen Schicksal von den Sternen verhüllt bleibt!"
languages.original_text: "While you were mending the wounds of this world left by the twisted ones' attack, I was able to discover... no, not Crudarach's fate. Merely traces of it. As Muaran found sanctuary under the boughs of the Lilaethan's forests, so did my other kin find refuge in a system known as the Atlas Reach. We must make a journey there with haste... before new dangers destroy the witnesses who can show me a way to the lost Crudarach, whose fate remains shrouded by the stars!"

traits.locale_text: "Während Ihr Euch der Wunden dieser Welt annahmt, die der Angriff der Verzerrten hinterließ, schaffte ich es, Crudarachs Schicksal aufzudecken. Leider nicht vollständig. Sondern nur einzelne Spuren davon. So wie Muaran unter den Ästen der Wäldern Lileaths Zuflucht fand, so fand auch mein Volk Zuflucht in einem System, das als Atlas-Weite bekannt ist. Wir müssen schnell dorthin reisen ... bevor neue Gefahren alle Zeugen vernichten. Nur sie können mir den Weg zum verlorenen Crudarach zeigen, dessen Schicksal von den Sternen verhüllt bleibt!"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Mientras suturabas las heridas de este mundo infligidas por el ataque de esos degenerados, yo pude descubrir... no, no hablo del destino de Crudarach. Solo indicios del mismo. Así como Muaran halló santuario bajo las copas de los árboles del Lilaethan, mis otros congéneres también encontraron refugio en un sistema que vosotros conocéis como la Cuenca de Atlas. Debemos viajar allí con premura... ¡antes de que otros peligros destruyan a los únicos testigos que pueden mostrarme el camino a la desaparecida Crudarach, cuyo sino permanece oculto por las estrellas!».
languages.original_text: "While you were mending the wounds of this world left by the twisted ones' attack, I was able to discover... no, not Crudarach's fate. Merely traces of it. As Muaran found sanctuary under the boughs of the Lilaethan's forests, so did my other kin find refuge in a system known as the Atlas Reach. We must make a journey there with haste... before new dangers destroy the witnesses who can show me a way to the lost Crudarach, whose fate remains shrouded by the stars!"

traits.locale_text: «Mientras suturabas las heridas de este mundo infligidas por el ataque de esos degenerados, yo pude descubrir... no, no hablo del destino de Crudarach. Solo indicios del mismo. Así como Muaran halló santuario bajo las copas de los árboles del Lilaethan, mis otros congéneres también encontraron refugio en un sistema que vosotros conocéis como la Demarcación de Atlas. Debemos viajar allí con premura... ¡antes de que otros peligros destruyan a los únicos testigos que pueden mostrarme el camino a la desaparecida Crudarach, cuyo sino permanece oculto por las estrellas!».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sen çarpık olanların saldırılarının bu dünyada meydana getirdiği yaraları iyileştirmeye odaklanırken ben de bir şey keşfettim. Hayır, Crudarach'a ne olduğunu değil. Onun izlerini yalnızca. Nasıl Muaran, Lilaethan'ın ormanlarındaki dalların altında kendine bir sığınak bulduysa diğer soydaşlarım da Atlas Uzanımı olarak bilinen bir sisteme sığınmış. Akıbeti yıldızlarca gizlenen, kayıp Crudarach'a giden yolu bana gösterebilecek tanıklar, yeni tehlikelerce yok edilmeden önce hızla oraya yolculuk yapmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "While you were mending the wounds of this world left by the twisted ones' attack, I was able to discover... no, not Crudarach's fate. Merely traces of it. As Muaran found sanctuary under the boughs of the Lilaethan's forests, so did my other kin find refuge in a system known as the Atlas Reach. We must make a journey there with haste... before new dangers destroy the witnesses who can show me a way to the lost Crudarach, whose fate remains shrouded by the stars!"

Onun izlerini yalnızca. Nasıl Muaran, Lilaethan'ın ormanlarındaki dalların altında kendine bir sığınak bulduysa, diğer soydaşlarım da Atlas Uzanımı olarak bilinen bir sisteme sığınmış.
